replies.body: What's the problem here?  it says the ban will never be lifted.

> What's the problem here?  it says the ban will never be lifted.

Bans are removed on the boards making the fact that they remain on GD unnecessary and obnoxious.
If they have been removed isn't this an issue for support and not for the Boards Feedback area?  I mean it's not even about the boards.

> What's the problem here?  it says the ban will never be lifted.

Which would *ordinarily* make sense.

But why ban someone from a board....that literally **NO. ONE. CAN. POST. ON.**

Why?

What purpose does it serve?
